The royall receipt: or, Hezekiahs physicke A sermon deliuered at Pauls-Crosse, on Michaelmas Day, 1622. By Elias Petley. Petley, Elias.
[4], 49, [1] p.
Printed by B[ernard] A[lsop] for Edward Blackmore, and are to be sold at his shop, at the great south doore, going vp into S. Paules, London : 1623.
Printer's name from STC. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
